snippet.title: Making A Rhythm Game Inside POWERPOINT…
snippet.description:
Will I be able to remake Osu! using Microsoft PowerPoint as a game engine? Watch this video to find out...


Play the game: https://almighty-banana.itch.io/powerpoint-osu

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/devbanana
Discord: https://discord.gg/7eknEtp 
My Itch.io page: https://almighty-banana.itch.io/

0:00 - The Plan
0:14 - Making the Menu
0:41 - Hitting the circles
0:59 - getting dead
1:28 - Music
1:42 - Timing
2:05 - Final Song/Game
2:24 - done!

#Powerpoint #GameDev #osu
Making a game in powerpoint
I remade Osu! in PowerPoint...
I made a game in 1 day!

MUSIC:
Sneaky Snitch by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4384-sneaky-snitch
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Elusive Spies by WinnieTheMoog
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/8756-elusive-spies
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
